article_title: SunTrust Foundation gift to advance financial social work in Maryland
article_text:
Easton, MD (21601)

Today

Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 86F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds from time to time. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
